channel.title: playing with the black box
channel.description: Recent content on playing with the black box

item.title: Hello Hugo!
item.description: In an on-line dynamic world, I need an off-line static place of my own to be alone, shut down all the sensory inputs, think, and write. This might be the place. I am writing this with good old vim. Hugo generates the htmls and github serves the pages, so I always have backups! Let see if this old fashioned and distraction free method of writing get me back in the mood of writing.
